verses.verse: שִׁגָּי֗וֹן <WH7692> shig-ga-Yon, Shiggaion לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> le-Da-Vid of David אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which שָׁ֥ר <WH7891> shar which he sang לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> div-rei- concerning the words כ֝֗וּשׁ <WH3568> Chush, of Cush בֶּן־ ben- יְמִינִֽי׃ <WH1145> ye-mi-Ni. Benjamite יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <WH430> 'E-lo-hai my God בְּךָ֣ be-Cha חָסִ֑יתִי <WH2620> cha-Si-ti; in thee do I put my trust הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <WH3467> ho-shi-'E-ni save מִכָּל־ <WH3605> mik-kol all רֹ֝דְפַ֗י <WH7291> ro-de-Fai, me from all them that persecute וְהַצִּילֵֽנִי׃ <WH5337> ve-hatz-tzi-Le-ni. me and deliver

פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- Or יִטְרֹ֣ף <WH2963> yit-Rof Lest he tear כְּאַרְיֵ֣ה <WH738> ke-'ar-Yeh like a lion נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; my soul פֹּ֝רֵ֗ק <WH6561> po-Rek, rending [it] in pieces וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein there מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> matz-Tzil. while [there is] none to deliver

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱ֭לֹהַי <WH430> 'E-lo-hai my God אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if עָשִׂ֣יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti if I have done זֹ֑את <WH2063> Zot; likewise אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- If יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> yesh- this if there be עָ֥וֶל <WH5766> 'A-vel iniquity בְּכַפָּֽי׃ <WH3709> be-chap-Pai. in my hands

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If גָּ֭מַלְתִּי <WH1580> Ga-mal-ti If I have rewarded שֽׁוֹלְמִ֥י <WH7999> shol-Mi unto him that was at peace רָ֑ע <WH7451> Ra'; evil וָאֲחַלְּצָ֖ה <WH2502> va-'a-chal-le-Tzah with me (yea I have delivered צוֹרְרִ֣י <WH6887> tzor-Ri is mine enemy רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> rei-Kam. him that without cause

יִֽרַדֹּ֥ף <WH7291> yi-rad-Dof persecute אוֹיֵ֨ב׀ <WH341> o-Yev Let the enemy נַפְשִׁ֡י <WH5315> naf-Shi my soul וְיַשֵּׂ֗ג <WH5381> ve-yas-Seg, and take וְיִרְמֹ֣ס <WH7429> ve-yir-Mos [it] yea let him tread down לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> la-'A-retz upon the earth חַיָּ֑י <WH2416> chai-Yai; my life וּכְבוֹדִ֓י׀ <WH3519> u-che-vo-Di mine honour לֶעָפָ֖ר <WH6083> le-'a-Far in the dust יַשְׁכֵּ֣ן <WH7931> yash-Ken and lay סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

ק֘וּמָ֤ה <WH6965> ku-Mah Arise יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD בְּאַפֶּ֗ךָ <WH639> be-'ap-Pe-cha, in thine anger הִ֭נָּשֵׂא <WH5375> Hin-na-se lift up בְּעַבְר֣וֹת <WH5678> be-'av-Rot thyself because of the rage צוֹרְרָ֑י <WH6887> tzor-Rai; of mine enemies וְע֥וּרָה <WH5782> ve-'U-rah and awake אֵ֝לַ֗י <WH410> 'e-Lai, God מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> mish-Pat for me [to] the judgment צִוִּֽיתָ׃ <WH6680> tziv-Vi-ta. [that] thou hast commanded

וַעֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> va-'a-Dat So shall the congregation לְ֭אֻמִּים <WH3816> Le-'um-mim of the people תְּסוֹבְבֶ֑ךָּ <WH5437> te-sov-Ve-ka; compass thee about וְ֝עָלֶ֗יהָ <WH5921> ve-'a-Lei-ha, and over לַמָּר֥וֹם <WH4791> lam-ma-Rom thou on high שֽׁוּבָה׃ <WH7725> Shu-vah. for their sakes therefore return

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD יָדִ֪ין <WH1777> ya-Din shall judge עַ֫מִּ֥ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim the people שָׁפְטֵ֥נִי <WH8199> sha-fe-Te-ni judge יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; me O LORD כְּצִדְקִ֖י <WH6664> ke-tzid-Ki according to my righteousness וּכְתֻמִּ֣י <WH8537> u-che-tum-Mi and according to mine integrity עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lai. and

יִגְמָר־ <WH1584> yig-mor- come to an end נָ֬א <WH4994> na O רַ֨ע׀ <WH7451> ra' Oh let the wickedness רְשָׁעִים֮ <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked וּתְכוֹנֵ֪ן <WH3559> u-te-cho-Nen but establish צַ֫דִּ֥יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik the just וּבֹחֵ֣ן <WH974> u-vo-Chen trieth לִ֭בּ֗וֹת <WH3826> lib-Bot, the hearts וּכְלָי֗וֹת <WH3629> u-che-la-Yot, and reins אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> tzad-Dik. for the righteous

מָֽגִנִּ֥י <WH4043> ma-gin-Ni My defence עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is with אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; [is] of God מ֝וֹשִׁ֗יעַ <WH3467> mo-Shi-a', which saveth יִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> yish-rei- the upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> Lev. in heart

אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him God שׁוֹפֵ֣ט <WH8199> sho-Fet judgeth צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik; the righteous וְ֝אֵ֗ל <WH410> ve-'El, and God זֹעֵ֥ם <WH2194> zo-'Em is angry בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol every יֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> Yom. [with the wicked] every day

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo does not יָ֭שׁוּב <WH7725> Ya-shuv If he turn חַרְבּ֣וֹ <WH2719> char-Bo his sword יִלְט֑וֹשׁ <WH3913> yil-Toosh; not he will whet קַשְׁתּ֥וֹ <WH7198> kash-To his bow דָ֝רַ֗ךְ <WH1869> da-Rach, he hath bent וַֽיְכוֹנְנֶֽהָ׃ <WH3559> Vay-chon-Ne-ha. and made it ready

וְ֭לוֹ ve-lo הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> he-Chin He hath also prepared כְּלֵי־ <WH3627> ke-lei- for him the instruments מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> Ma-vet; of death חִ֝צָּ֗יו <WH2671> chitz-Tzav, his arrows לְֽדֹלְקִ֥ים <WH1814> le-do-le-Kim against the persecutors יִפְעָֽל׃ <WH6466> yif-'Al. he ordaineth

הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold יְחַבֶּל־ <WH2254> ye-chab-bel- Behold he travaileth אָ֑וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven; with iniquity וְהָרָ֥ה <WH2029> ve-ha-Rah and hath conceived עָ֝מָ֗ל <WH5999> 'a-Mal, mischief וְיָ֣לַד <WH3205> ve-Ya-lad and brought forth שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> Sha-ker. falsehood

בּ֣וֹר <WH953> Bor a pit כָּ֭רָֽה <WH3738> Ka-rah He made וַֽיַּחְפְּרֵ֑הוּ <WH2658> vai-yach-pe-Re-hu; and digged וַ֝יִּפֹּ֗ל <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol, it and is fallen בְּשַׁ֣חַת <WH7845> be-Sha-chat into the ditch יִפְעָֽל׃ <WH6466> yif-'Al. [which] he made

יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> ya-Shuv shall return עֲמָל֣וֹ <WH5999> a-ma-Lo His mischief בְרֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> ve-ro-Sho; upon his own head וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> ve-'Al upon קָ֝דְקֳד֗וֹ <WH6936> ka-de-ko-Do, upon his own pate חֲמָס֥וֹ <WH2555> cha-ma-So and his violent יֵרֵֽד׃ <WH3381> ye-Red. dealing shall come down

אוֹדֶ֣ה <WH3034> o-Deh I will praise יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD כְּצִדְק֑וֹ <WH6664> ke-tzid-Ko; according to his righteousness וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <WH2167> va-'a-zam-me-Rah, and will sing praise שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> shem- to the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> el-Yon. most high
